title: Mystery Horse at Oak Lane Stable
description: Twelve-year-old Cassie needs a horse. She’s determined to move up from helping out around Oak Lane Stable in exchange for a few riding lessons to having one of her own. But she needs a horse before the approaching Shady Creek Horse Show or she’ll get stuck riding George the old school horse and losing again to Lisa, her perfect classmate and riding rival since 5th grade, who has her own show horse and gets whatever she wants. But Cassie’s dad won’t buy her the bay mystery horse who shows up at the stable, rescued from a terrible fate, and is the one she’s sure is perfect for her. How can Cassie convince her dad to buy the mystery horse for her before time runs out and she loses the bay forever?Mystery Horse at Oak Lane Stable, Book 1 of the Oak Lane Stable Adventure Series, was a 2018 Royal Dragonfly Book Award Winner for New Author. See how the series begins! For middle grade readers ages 8 to 13.
author: Kerri Lukasavitz
